column4: Dang it, need a "Winblows" hack... to enable and create a new XP restore cd on a compaq before I install Ubuntu

OSX86 seems a fair project, thanks to apple backing off the project and letting it proceed
well really the only reason they back it is because they at the time where planning to switch to Intel CPUs
no Apple originaly forced the project to close, then it grew outside, and became to big, so apple just left it and has allowed it to progress.
i'm pretty sure they would have really tried to shut it down, if it wasn't going to benefit them
